ShortDescription.Value: A mod to dynamically adjust service building upkeep according to a predefined rate.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Smart Upkeep Manager Get balanced upkeep cost for all service buildings dependant on various functions provided by the building.
Each factor is manually set with a predefined default value, but it's also possible to change every factors rates. All values can also be set to 0 too, making all upkeep free.
# All options are optional.
If you think some values are very out of balance and just changing the sliders won't make difference, feel free to reach out.
- Does not modify the save itself. Removing the mod will revert everything back to vanilla.
